pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to 'IGN' Web Services // Automatic open data acquisition from resources of IGN ('Institut National de Information Geographique et forestiere') (https://www.ign.fr/). Available datasets include various types of raster and vector data, such as digital elevation models, state borders, spatial databases, cadastral parcels, and more. 'happign' also provide access to API Carto (https://apicarto.ign.fr/api/doc/).
